text: Estée Lauder Companies are an organization that manufactures, markets and sells perfume, skin care, hair care and cosmetics. This company was named after a person called Estée Lauder. == Overview == It was established in 1946 in New York City. In 1960, the office in London was opened. In 1964, Aramis fragrance for men was presented. In 2010, the company bought Smashbox Beauty Cosmetics, Inc. == References == Category:1946 establishments in the United States Category:1940s establishments in New York (state) Category:Companies based in New York City Category:Perfumery Category:Cosmetics companies
title: Estée Lauder Companies
